entry.title: Israel Strikes Hamas and Hezbollah Sites, Hunts Intruders in the South
entry.content: Artillery exchanges between Israel and Hezbollah militants in Lebanon raised the specter of a second front as soldiers engaged in gunbattles with Hamas fighters who had invaded from Gaza.

entry.title: Israel Declares War on Hamas After Surprise Assault From Gaza
entry.content: Hamas fired thousands of rockets as far north as Tel Aviv and sent fighters into southern cities near the border.

entry.title: After Attack, Israel Wrestles With Question: How Could This Happen?
entry.content: The coordinated assault by Palestinian militants punctures the countryâ€™s aura of invincibility.
